sense.name: full general
sense.commentary: a general officer of the highest rank
sense.examples: The general ordered two men to be positioned at the gate.

sense.name: superior general
sense.commentary: the head of a religious order or congregation
sense.examples: Our current Superior General is Brother Mark Howard.

sense.name: the whole
sense.commentary: a fact about the whole (as opposed to the particular)
sense.examples: He discussed the general but neglected the particular.
